title: Phase 6: Share Extension - UI
description:
Create ShareViewController.swift with UIHostingController for SwiftUI, ShareExtensionView.swift with form UI, URL extraction, title pre-fill, recent tags chips, Cancel/Save buttons, and state management. See PLAN.md Phase 6 for details.

Verification:
- Share from Safari shows extension
- URL displayed in form
- Page title pre-filled
- Cancel dismisses extension
- Recent tags appear

title: Phase 10: Testing & Polish (iOS/iPadOS)
description:
Comprehensive testing and polish: test all error scenarios, test on physical iOS device, test on iPad, test VoiceOver accessibility, test Dynamic Type, add app icon, polish UI spacing and fonts. See PLAN.md Phase 10 and Testing Checklist for details.

Verification:
- All Testing Checklist items pass
- Works on physical device
- No console warnings/errors
- UI correct on all iPhone sizes

title: Phase 5: Main App - Settings Screen
description:
Create SettingsView.swift with server URL, username, password fields, password visibility toggle, URL normalization, default toggles, Advanced section (self-signed certs, debug logging), Test Connection with detailed diagnostics, and Save button. Can be developed in parallel with Phase 2 & 3. See PLAN.md Phase 5 for details.

Verification:
- Settings persist after app restart
- Test Connection works and shows appropriate errors
- Toggle states persist correctly

title: Phase 11: macOS Support (Optional)
description:
Optional macOS support: add macOS target, adapt UI for window sizing, add macOS Share Extension, test in Safari on Mac, test keyboard navigation (Tab, Enter, Escape, Cmd+S). See PLAN.md Phase 11 for details.

Verification:
- Main app runs on macOS with proper sizing
- Share extension in Safari share menu
- Full keyboard navigation works

title: Phase 3: Shiori API Client
description:
Create ShioriAPI.swift client with login and add bookmark methods. Implement self-signed certificate support, session caching (SessionManager.swift), and detailed connection error diagnostics. Test manually before building UI. See PLAN.md Phase 3 for details.

Verification:
- Login API works with valid/invalid credentials
- Add bookmark API creates bookmark in Shiori
- Self-signed cert support works (if applicable)

title: Phase 1: Project Setup
description:
Create Xcode project, configure Bundle IDs, add Share Extension target, enable App Groups and Keychain Sharing capabilities, set deployment targets, add Privacy Manifest. See PLAN.md Phase 1 for details.

Verification:
- Project builds for iOS and macOS
- Share Extension target in scheme selector
- Capabilities configured in Signing & Capabilities

title: Phase 4: Main App - Instructions Screen
description:
Create InstructionsView.swift with welcome text, step-by-step usage instructions, tip about reordering share sheet, About Shiori section, and navigation to Settings. Can be developed in parallel with Phase 2 & 3. See PLAN.md Phase 4 for details.

Verification:
- App launches and shows Instructions screen
- Gear icon navigates to Settings
- All text readable and properly formatted

title: Phase 7: Share Extension - Save Flow
description:
Implement save flow: credential check, URL validation, background task, session management, API call with bookmark ID capture, recent tags update, haptic feedback, success screen with Done and Open in Shiori buttons. See PLAN.md Phase 7 for details.

Verification:
- Save bookmark appears in Shiori
- Done button closes extension
- Open in Shiori opens bookmark in Safari
- Haptic feedback on success
- Tags saved to recent list

title: Phase 8: Share Extension - Error Handling
description:
Implement error handling: error enum with all types, error views for each state, retry functionality for network/server errors, user-friendly error messages, handle 'bookmark already exists' as success. See PLAN.md Phase 8 for details.

Verification:
- No credentials: Server Not Configured error
- Wrong credentials: Authentication Failed error
- Server unreachable: Connection Failed with Retry
- Retry button re-attempts save

title: Phase 9: Integration Smoke Test
description:
Critical checkpoint before polish. Verify complete happy path: fresh install, configure credentials, share from Safari, fill fields, save, Open in Shiori, verify bookmark in Shiori, share another URL and verify recent tags. See PLAN.md Phase 9 for details.

All verification steps must pass before proceeding to Phase 10.

title: Phase 2: Keychain Helper & Storage
description:
Create KeychainHelper.swift, SettingsManager.swift, URLExtractor.swift, DebugLogger.swift. Critical: verify Keychain and UserDefaults sharing works between main app and extension before proceeding. See PLAN.md Phase 2 for details.

Verification:
- Write test value to Keychain from main app
- Read that value from Share Extension - MUST succeed
- Same test for App Group UserDefaults
